name: Arrows in Orbit
description:
A basic wave-based bow & arrow shooting game on a tiny planet. Try not to shoot yourself in the back.

This is my entry for the Ludum Dare 38 jam.

Player models are stock models from MagicaVoxel.

Music by Max Mayhem.

In case of performance issues with the browser version, please try the downloadable one.

Default keyboard & mouse controls:
  • movement: WASD
  • turning: mouse / arrow keys
  • shoot: left click / left ctrl
  • toggle music: M
  • quit game: esc
